mapper.select: select shoes_Id as shoes_Id, shoes_Name as shoes_Name, shoes_Price as shoes_Price, num_Like as num_Like, cate_Name as cate_Name, revise_Date as revise_Date, is_Like as is_Like, brand_Name as brand_Name, color_Code as color_Code from shoes where shoes_Name like CONCAT('%',#{shoes_Name},'%');
